snippet.title: WiiWare and Virtual Console Monday: Shining Midnight Golf edition
snippet.description: ...I guess weve been spoiled these past few weeks, as the WiiWare and Virtual Console line-ups have continued to give us great game after great game. But all good things must come to an end, though there are still a few titles to get excited about this week. WiiWare Midnight Bowling (GameLoft, 1-4 players, Rated E, 800 Wii points) If there is one thing the Wii needs, its a bowling game. Its not like...

snippet.title: Sackboy comes to Hot Shots Golf, a dozen people are excited
snippet.description: ...Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds is one of the more enjoyable PS3 games that it seems no one talks about. It's a shame too, the game is a very fun and addictive take on golf.You can read our original review for more info.Owners of the game will get a fun bonus tomorrow: Sackboy will be hitting...

snippet.title: Tiger Woods on the Wii comes with disc-golf (video)
snippet.description: ...Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10 is going to be one of the first games bundled with the Wii MotionPlus, and it's the game that has many of us excited about the technology. A trailer for the title shows off the ability to play disc golf using the peripheral, and the video gives you a good idea of just...

snippet.title: Google enters gaming with AdSense for Games
snippet.description: ...In-game advertising has long been a hot button issue among gamers. They can be intrusive and often downright annoying. But development isnt getting any cheaper, so in-game ads arent going anywhere... AdSense for Games. Like the original AdSense, this service will include text, photo, and video...
